FILE: cm352630v11.0.txt
DYAD: CYPRUS - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV937
DISPUTE(S): MID2818 

PSNOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180911
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180911


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2818 

TERRMID: MID2818 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2818 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2818 from Gibler 2018, in 1978 Iran attacked two Cypriot ships transporting oil. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute, in which Iran and Iraq regularly attacked cargo ships trading with the other country to harm the other's economy. 

MARITMID: MID2818 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2818 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2818 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2818 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2818 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2818 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2818 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 


NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:


SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
